thread.title: Yankees clinch playoff spot after 2-year absence, top Boston
thread.title_full: Yankees clinch playoff spot after 2-year absence, top Boston

title: Yankees clinch playoff spot after 2-year absence, top Boston
text:
> Top News Yankees clinch playoff spot after 2-year absence, top Boston New York Yankees starting pitcher CC Sabathia (52) embraces a teammate after he helped the Yankees clinch a wild card berth in the playoffs after the Yankees defeated the Boston Red Sox 4-1 in a baseball game in New York, Thursday, Oct. 1, 2015. (AP Photo/Kathy Willens) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
